main event: A round object with a greenish glow was observed in the sky, believed to be a meteor.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 30 seconds,The object had a streak tapering from it, creating a bright light in the sky,The object was moving from NE to SW,It appeared to disappear into clouds at a 60-degree angle to the horizon,The sighting was confirmed by a military source.
sighted object: round object with a greenish glow
